Room.Name: Hafnia Mountain Road
Room.ShortDescription: A deep valley is on the north side of the road.
Room.LongDescription: On the south side there is a pleasant mountain pasture, where you see a shepherd and his flock of sheep. Looks like a small stone building is in the pasture, perhaps to provide shelter from the frequent mountain storms. The road drops swiftly to the southwest. Hafnia Mountain towers over you.
